text: I'm getting reports that Windows 10 22H2 are seeing reboots after each patch: KB5031224 .net update for 3.5 4.8 and 4.81 then they are being pushed the full .net 4.81 KB5011048 and THEN the KB5031356 October security update. Anyone else seeing multiple reboots this month on that platform? -- %4060a58536.com
